ygData.subject: looking cool. *some spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I finally got some info on the Orb.  It s supposingly found in Guk somewhere.  My friend told me the name although I ve forgotten already...I ll let you
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I finally got some info on the Orb. It's supposingly found in Guk
somewhere. My friend told me the name although I've forgotten
already...I'll let you guys know when I ask again. Says it's a real rare
spawn.

I want the black robes myself. But from reading previous posts...it sounds
like it's a pretty challenging struggle to get it. Better yet to just
purchase it off of people who are starting to sell it. I've seen 150pp
deals so far. But it IS more fun to go get it yourself. :) Think it's off
of Najena (?).

-- Lim'Dul



>Message: 2
Date: Wed, 2 Jun 1999 15:17:12 -0500
From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
>Subject: Re: bath robes

>Aye I have seen the rod you speak of. Tis the Shimmering Orb, not sure
>where it comes from though. Does anyone know what level you need to be to
>get the flowing black robes? I have started to see more and more
spellcasters with this item on them, and some are only level 20.


-Solric
